explains: n. 助跑；预备阶段；抬高；急剧增长

sentences.en: The company believes the products will sell well in the run-up to Christmas.
sentences.cn: 该公司相信这些产品在圣诞节前夕将会销得很好。

sentences.en: Supermarkets everywhere reported excellent trading in the run-up to Christmas.
sentences.cn: 各地超级市场报告说圣诞节前生意火爆。

sentences.en: How had he managed to run up so many debts?
